title: Wonder Showzen
content:
After lunch I entered an office which a bunch of my colleagues were in. They were in the process of watching a video of two giant squishy letters “getting it on”. If you go to this link and click videos and then choose Diversity I believe there is a clip. I couldn’t watch it because it doesn’t work on Macintosh.

[http://www.mtv2.com/#wondershowzen](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810065808/http:/www.mtv2.com/#wondershowzen "http://www.mtv2.com/#wondershowzen")

It is an interesting office I work in…

peace

 [‹ General Posting Guidelines](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810065808/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17384 "Go to previous forum topic") [Design competitions ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810065808/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20465 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Paul Cutler

comments.content:
I have a Mac, but must admit I’ve seen this before. Educational television indeed (I had no idea how to get busy while dressed as a letter, now I’m ready).

Don’t you hate it when you post something and it just hangs out there for a really long time.
